verses.verse: And it came to pass in the four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and eightieth <S%H8084><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Solomon's <S%H8010><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%>, in the month <S%H2320><s%> Zif <S%H2099><s%>, which is the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, that he began to build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. began: Heb. built

And the house <S%H1004><s%> which king <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, the length <S%H753><s%> thereof was threescore <S%H8346><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, and the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And the porch <S%H197><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, according to the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>; and ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof before the house <S%H1004><s%>.
And for the house <S%H1004><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> windows <S%H2474><s%> of narrow <S%H331><s%> lights <S%H8261><s%>. of: or, broad within, and narrow without: or, skewed and closed

And against the wall <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> he built <S%H1129><s%> chambers <S%H3326><s%> <S%H3326><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, against the walls <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, both of the temple <S%H1964><s%> and of the oracle <S%H1687><s%>: and he made <S%H6213><s%> chambers <S%H6763><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>: against the wall: or, upon, or, joining to the wall built chambers: Heb. built floors made chambers: Heb. made ribs

The nethermost <S%H8481><s%> chamber <S%H3326><s%> <S%H3326><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>, and the middle <S%H8484><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>, and the third <S%H7992><s%> was seven <S%H7651><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>: for without in the wall of <S%H2351><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> he made <S%H5414><s%> narrowed rests <S%H4052><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, that the beams should not be fastened <S%H270><s%> in the walls <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>. narrowed: Heb. narrowings, or, rebatements

And the house <S%H1004><s%>, when it was in building <S%H1129><s%>, was built <S%H1129><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> made ready <S%H8003><s%> before it was brought <S%H4551><s%> thither: so that there was neither hammer <S%H4717><s%> nor axe <S%H1631><s%> nor any tool <S%H3627><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%>, while it was in building <S%H1129><s%>.

The door <S%H6607><s%> for the middle <S%H8484><s%> chamber <S%H6763><s%> was in the right <S%H3233><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>: and they went up <S%H5927><s%> with winding stairs <S%H3883><s%> into the middle <S%H8484><s%> chamber, and out of the middle <S%H8484><s%> into the third <S%H7992><s%>. side: Heb. shoulder

So he built <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>, and finished <S%H3615><s%> it; and covered <S%H5603><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> with beams <S%H1356><s%> and boards <S%H7713><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%>. with: or, the vaultbeams and the panellings with cedar

And then he built <S%H1129><s%> chambers <S%H3326><s%> <S%H3326><s%> against all the house <S%H1004><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high <S%H6967><s%>: and they rested <S%H270><s%> on the house <S%H1004><s%> with timber <S%H6086><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came to Solomon <S%H8010><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Concerning this house <S%H1004><s%> which thou art in building <S%H1129><s%>, if thou wilt walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and execute <S%H6213><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> all my commandments <S%H4687><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in them; then will I perform <S%H6965><s%> my word <S%H1697><s%> with thee, which I spake <S%H1696><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>:
And I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and will not forsake <S%H5800><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
So Solomon <S%H8010><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>, and finished <S%H3615><s%> it.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> the walls <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> with boards <S%H6763><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%>, both the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and the walls <S%H7023><s%> of the cieling <S%H5604><s%>: and he covered <S%H6823><s%> them on the inside <S%H1004><s%> with wood <S%H6086><s%>, and covered <S%H6823><s%> the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> with planks <S%H6763><s%> of fir <S%H1265><s%>. both: or, from the floor of the house unto the walls, etc

And he built <S%H1129><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, both <S%H4480><s%> the floor <S%H7172><s%> and the walls <S%H7023><s%> with boards <S%H6763><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%>: he even built <S%H1129><s%> them for it within <S%H1004><s%>, even for the oracle <S%H1687><s%>, even for the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place.
And the house <S%H1004><s%>, that is, the temple <S%H1964><s%> before <S%H3942><s%> it, was forty <S%H705><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long.

And the cedar <S%H730><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> within <S%H6441><s%> was carved <S%H4734><s%> with knops <S%H6497><s%> and open <S%H6362><s%> flowers <S%H6731><s%>: all was cedar <S%H730><s%>; there was no stone <S%H68><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%>. knops: or, gourds open: Heb. openings of

And the oracle <S%H1687><s%> he prepared <S%H3559><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> within <S%H6441><s%>, to set <S%H5414><s%> there the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And the oracle <S%H1687><s%> in the forepart <S%H6440><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> in length <S%H753><s%>, and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> in breadth <S%H7341><s%>, and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> in the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof: and he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H5462><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>; and so covered <S%H6823><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> which was of cedar <S%H730><s%>. pure: Heb. shut up

So Solomon <S%H8010><s%> overlaid <S%H6823><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> within <S%H6441><s%> with pure <S%H5462><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: and he made a partition <S%H5674><s%> by the chains <S%H7572><s%> <S%H7572><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%>; and he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> it with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And the whole house <S%H1004><s%> he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>, until he had finished <S%H8552><s%> all the house <S%H1004><s%>: also the whole altar <S%H4196><s%> that was by the oracle <S%H1687><s%> he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And within the oracle <S%H1687><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubims <S%H3742><s%> of olive <S%H8081><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, each ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high <S%H6967><s%>. olive: or, oily: Heb. trees of oil

And five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the one <S%H259><s%> wing <S%H3671><s%> of the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> wing <S%H3671><s%> of the cherub <S%H3742><s%>: from the uttermost part <S%H7098><s%> of the one wing <S%H3671><s%> unto the uttermost part <S%H7098><s%> of the other <S%H3671><s%> were ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> was ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: both <S%H8147><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> size <S%H7095><s%>.
The height <S%H6967><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> was ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and so was it of the other <S%H8145><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%>.

And he set <S%H5414><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>: and they stretched forth <S%H6566><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>, so that the wing <S%H3671><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> the one wall <S%H7023><s%>, and the wing <S%H3671><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> wall <S%H7023><s%>; and their wings <S%H3671><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> one <S%H3671><s%> another <S%H3671><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>. they: or, the cherubims stretched forth their wings
And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And he carved <S%H7049><s%> all the walls <S%H7023><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> round about <S%H4524><s%> with carved <S%H6603><s%> figures <S%H4734><s%> of cherubims <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> and open <S%H6362><s%> flowers <S%H6731><s%>, within <S%H6441><s%> and without <S%H2435><s%>. open flowers: Heb. openings of flowers
And the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>, within <S%H6441><s%> and without <S%H2435><s%>.

And for the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the oracle <S%H1687><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> doors <S%H1817><s%> of olive <S%H8081><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>: the lintel <S%H352><s%> and side posts <S%H4201><s%> were a fifth part <S%H2549><s%> of the wall. a fifth: or, fivesquare

The two <S%H8147><s%> doors <S%H1817><s%> also were of olive <S%H8081><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>; and he carved <S%H7049><s%> upon them carvings <S%H4734><s%> of cherubims <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> and open <S%H6362><s%> flowers <S%H6731><s%>, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and spread <S%H7286><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> upon the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>, and upon the palm trees <S%H8561><s%>. two: or, leaves of the doors open flowers: Heb. openings of flowers

So also made <S%H6213><s%> he for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the temple <S%H1964><s%> posts <S%H4201><s%> of olive <S%H8081><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, a fourth part <S%H7243><s%> of the wall. a fourth: or, foursquare

And the two <S%H8147><s%> doors <S%H1817><s%> were of fir <S%H1265><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>: the two <S%H8147><s%> leaves <S%H6763><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> door <S%H1817><s%> were folding <S%H1550><s%>, and the two <S%H8147><s%> leaves <S%H7050><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> door <S%H1817><s%> were folding <S%H1550><s%>.

And he carved <S%H7049><s%> thereon cherubims <S%H3742><s%> and palm trees <S%H8561><s%> and open <S%H6362><s%> flowers <S%H6731><s%>: and covered <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%> fitted <S%H3474><s%> upon the carved work <S%H2707><s%>.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> with three <S%H7969><s%> rows <S%H2905><s%> of hewed stone <S%H1496><s%>, and a row <S%H2905><s%> of cedar <S%H730><s%> beams <S%H3773><s%>.
In the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> was the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> laid <S%H3245><s%>, in the month <S%H3391><s%> Zif <S%H2099><s%>:

And in the eleventh <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the month <S%H3391><s%> Bul <S%H945><s%>, which is the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, was the house <S%H1004><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> throughout all the parts <S%H1697><s%> thereof, and according to all the fashion <S%H4941><s%> of it. So was he seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in building <S%H1129><s%> it. through out: or, with all the parts thereof, and with all the ordinances thereof
